mapper.select: SELECT ba.id AS id, u.user_name AS userName, ba.title AS title, ba.summary AS summary, ba.content AS content, bc.category_name AS blogCategoryName, ba.blog_category_id AS categoryId, ba.thumbnail AS thumbnail, ba.is_top AS isTop, ba.view_count AS viewCount, ba.update_time AS updateTime FROM blog_article ba INNER JOIN user u ON ba.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN blog_category bc ON ba.blog_category_id = bc.id WHERE ba.is_deleted=0 ORDER BY ba.is_top,ba.update_time DESC
SELECT id,view_count FROM blog_article WHERE is_deleted=0
SELECT id,url FROM blog_article WHERE is_deleted=0

SELECT ba.id AS id, u.user_name AS userName, ba.title AS title, ba.summary AS summary, ba.url AS url, ba.content AS content, bc.category_name AS blogCategoryName, ba.blog_category_id AS categoryId, ba.thumbnail AS thumbnail, ba.is_top AS isTop, ba.view_count AS viewCount, ba.update_time AS updateTime FROM blog_article ba INNER JOIN user u ON ba.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN blog_category bc ON ba.blog_category_id = bc.id WHERE ba.is_deleted=0 AND ba.url=#{url}
SELECT url FROM blog_article WHERE is_deleted=0 ORDER BY is_top,update_time DESC
